nodes.text: HJ-377 was a male soldier that fought for the Galactic Empire alongside another soldier during Emperor Palpatine's reign before the year 1 BBY. While fighting a rebel group, explosions and concussions shook the ground. Thinking it was the rebel fighters, HJ-377 went mad and ran towards a treeline, firing his rifle until it was empty. In fact, the attack came not from the rebels, but rather from orbit, and Imperial dropships soon arrived to help the Imperial soldiers.

HJ-377 was first mentioned in the "Imperial dropship" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3/Xbox 360 versions of the LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, which was released on October 26, 2010.
